g.text: organizations(id, name, slug, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at)
teams(id, org_id→organizations.id, name, slug, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at)
role_types(id, org_id→organizations.id|null, name, can_org_manage, can_team_manage, can_team_write, can_read_all)
invites(id, org_id→organizations.id, team_id→teams.id?, email, token, role_id→role_types.id, expires_at, accepted_at)
audit_events(id, org_id?, actor_user_id?, action, entity_type, entity_id, ip, user_agent, metadata, created_at)
